duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform total store recovery, refilling, and replenishing of products across multiple departments in the store as needed
Provide customer service by answering product-related questions and assisting customers in a friendly manner
Maintain a clean and safe store environment for the customer shopping experience
Check shipments for out-of-date and damaged products to ensure freshness and quality
Collect carts from the parking lot and organize store areas daily to ensure they're clean and well stocked

education_certification.credential: Completion of required job skills and compliance-related training
Experience as a JVSS Scanner, or equivalent
